alert.note: Alert for Finney; Haskell; Lane; Scott; Seward (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued April 17 at 4:06AM CDT until April 18 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 043, 044, 063, 076, AND 086... * AFFECTED AREA...In Kansas, Fire Weather Zone 043 Scott, Fire Weather Zone 044 Lane, Fire Weather Zone 063 Finney, Fire Weather Zone 076 Haskell and Fire Weather Zone 086 Seward. * WINDS...South 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 15 percent, but the confidence in 15 percent or less relative humidity is much lower given the close proximity of higher moisture just to the east. * IMPACTS...Given the ongoing drought and continued dormant vegetation, any ignitions will have the potential to burn out of control quickly. Any outdoor burning, or outdoor activities involving sparks or flames, should be avoided.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
